mapper.insert: insert into pro_brief ( pro_name, pro_user_stu_id, pro_upload_time, pro_show, file_type_id, pro_desc) values (#{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proUserStuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proUploadTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{proShow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update pro_brief set pro_name = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_user_stu_id = #{proUserStuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_upload_time = #{proUploadTime,jdbcType=DATE}, pro_show = #{proShow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_type_id = #{fileTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_desc = #{proDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, pro_name, pro_user_stu_id, pro_upload_time, pro_show, file_type_id, pro_desc from pro_brief
